original_text: So the guard took away their choice food and the wine they were to drink and gave them vegetables instead.
korean_text: 그리하여 감독하는 자가 그들에게 지정된 음식과 마실 포도주를 제하고 채식을 주니라

sentences.original_text: So the guard took away their choice food
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 경비병은 그들의 맛있는 음식을 가져갔고

sentences.original_text: and the wine they were to drink
